data.name: Rove - The Wanderer's Tale
data.detailed_description:
The Wanderer wakes up in a hidden area of a crypt, not knowing where and who he is. In this isometric Action RPG you explore the world of Rove together with the Wanderer. You’ll meet people who want to help you. You’ll fight undead creatures, goblins and elemental monsters, loot weapons and gear, get stronger and finally figure out what happened to the Wanderer.

Fight

Grab a sword or a hammer for offensive melee combat. Equip a bow and focus on ranged attacks. Or use a wizard staff and focus on your magic spells.

Quest

Accompany the Wanderer on his main quest to unravel his past. Help the people of Rove with their small and big problems.

Explore

In the fantasy world of Rove everything was peaceful. Deers graze in the green forest. Even penguins were seen in colder areas. But suddenly the climate changes. Undead rising from their graves. Dangerous creatures appear everywhere. Figure out what caused this, together with the Wanderer.

Loot

Defeat your enemies and grab their loot - it may be epic! Find parts of rare equipment sets. Even legendary unique items wait for you to be found.

Customize

Earn experience points and unlock dozens of skills from three different skill trees - the Warrior, the Hunter and the Elementalist.

data.short_description: Accompany the Wanderer on his journey in this story-driven Action RPG to unravel his past and determine his future.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD Processor, 2.5 Ghz or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD Series Card or Higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications are not final and are subject to change.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible 3D graphics card with at least 256MB of addressable memory (ATI Radeon x1600 or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications are not final and are subject to change.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Comic Blood, Violence
